string.text: I have some assorted artifacts if you're interested. I don't need much - the house gets awfully cold and drafty. Could you bring me a few things to help keep an old man warm?
Ahh, that's much better. Thank you.

There is one thing, actually. I would like to find some thermal artifacts to help make some hot water, but I can't find any in this area. I do have this nice Goldfish though - could you bring me something suitable in exchange?
